title: Unit 8 - Prince Zak And The Wise Frog
subtitle: Unit 8
meanings: to do what you promised or agreed to do
to control or hide a strong emotion, such as excitement or anger
to behave with poor manners or a lack of courtesy
to look carefully or with difficulty
to want something, especially strongly
to take something away suddenly and roughly
having a hole or empty space inside
extremely or unpleasantly dirty
dark and dirty or difficult to see through
easy to see, recognise, or understand
very good, beautiful, or deserving to be admired
to be happy, ready or eager to do something
to watch very closely, and notice every detail
in a brave and confident way, without showing any fear
in a way that shows a lack of trust; suspiciously
in a way that shows disapproval
too strong or violent to be controlled
something that someone wears to hide their true appearance
the achieving of desired results, or someone or something that achieves positive results
showing that you are grateful for something that person has done
sentences: She must honour her promise to him and return the money she borrowed.
She could no longer contain her anger and started yelling at him.
There will always be some children who misbehave at the playground.
When no one answered the door, she peered through the window to see if anyone was there.
Karen finally received the book that she had desired.
The little boy cried when his sister snatched his toy away from him.
If you tap on the wall, you can hear it is hollow behind.
Hannah washed her filthy hands after playing with mud.
The river was brown and murky after the storm.
It is obvious that he does not like dogs as he walks away when my dog goes near him.
The view from the top of the mountain is magnificent.
I am willing to help you if you want me to.
He observed keenly how the baker kneaded the dough.
The soldiers fought boldly when their enemies attacked them.
She eyed the cat warily as she was afraid that it might pounce on her.
The teacher sternly told the students to keep their volume down.
Lucy sobbed uncontrollably when she lost her favourite pen.
The thief put on a disguise as he hoped that no one would recognise him.
The concert was a success and received many positive reviews.
These flowers are a token of my appreciation for all your help.
